page.title: 16WIMBORNE DISTRICT COUNCIL
page.content: The Council offices are situated at Broomhill.They are Ten years old and employ 340 people.There are six departments which include the planning,surveyor's and public health departments.They have recently started to use computers to aid there work.The area covered by the council includes Wimborne.Corfe Mullen,Colehill,Ferndown,West Moors,Alderholt,St.Ives,West Parley and Cranborne. Employees at the offices work flexi-hours.This means that when they arrive for work they turn a dial and when they go they turn it back.The dial counts the hours worked.They can enter the premises anytime between 8-8.30a.m. and may exit between 4-4.30p.m..They may spen up to two hours for lunch.
